LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.label: pickaxe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.description: This basic invention is effective as a weapon, while being a tool at the same time. Needs some muscles to work with, but makes digging through mountains overall more comfortable.\n\nThe shape of the head allows to pierce thicker armor.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Pickaxe.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.label: hammer
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.description: A hammer is a tool that consists of a heavy piece of metal or stone at the end of a handle. It is used, for example, to hit nails into a piece of wood or a wall.\n\nThis basic invention is effective as a weapon, while being a tool at the same time. Needs some muscles to work with, but lets you construct with more ease.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Hammer.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.label: battle axe
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.description: A mighty weapon on the battlefield in the right kind of hands. Made to cut through flesh and bones alike.\n\nFavored by the Berserker clans, the battle axe is a weapon usually used by medieval knights. With a powerful swing it is capable of eliminating most enemies in close quarters.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_BattleAxe.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.label: halberd
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.description: Halberd is a pike fitted with a light axe head. Due to the spear-like sharp tip, it's a great tool against armored enemies.\n\nUsed to fight down horse-mounted warriors in medieval times thanks to its its extraordinary length.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Halberd.tools.2.label: point
